texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Dear NVIDIANs and Stakeholders,
texts.text: Dear NVIDIANs and Stakeholders,

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: A new industrial revolution is underwaytransforming energy into artificial intelligence.
texts.text: A new industrial revolution is underwaytransforming energy into artificial intelligence.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: And just as power plants fueled the industrial economy, AI factories will power the intelligence economy.
texts.text: And just as power plants fueled the industrial economy, AI factories will power the intelligence economy.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The factory of this industrial revolution, an AI factory, is powered by computers created by NVIDIA.
texts.text: The factory of this industrial revolution, an AI factory, is powered by computers created by NVIDIA.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: For decades, computing advanced through hand-coded software executed on CPUs. That model has reached its limits. Today, computers learn to understand, reason, and solve problems using machine learning algorithms running on GPUs.
texts.text: For decades, computing advanced through hand-coded software executed on CPUs. That model has reached its limits. Today, computers learn to understand, reason, and solve problems using machine learning algorithms running on GPUs.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: AI is the new model of computing. This transformation is global, sweeping across every market and institution-from digital customer service and drug discovery to financial trading, software development, robotics, and self-driving cars.
texts.text: AI is the new model of computing. This transformation is global, sweeping across every market and institution-from digital customer service and drug discovery to financial trading, software development, robotics, and self-driving cars.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Just as bits are the fundamental units of classical computing, tokens are the atomic units of digital intelligence-the symbols through which AI expresses thought. Each token is a fragment of meaning: a word, a piece of code, a strand of DNA. In sequence, they form thoughts, instructions, stories, and reasoning.
texts.text: Just as bits are the fundamental units of classical computing, tokens are the atomic units of digital intelligence-the symbols through which AI expresses thought. Each token is a fragment of meaning: a word, a piece of code, a strand of DNA. In sequence, they form thoughts, instructions, stories, and reasoning.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: NVIDIA computers are the thinking machines that generate these tokens, the currency of the AI age.
texts.text: NVIDIA computers are the thinking machines that generate these tokens, the currency of the AI age.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: A new type of infrastructure has emerged-AI factories. Just as earlier factories forged steel or assembled cars, AI factories generate tokens, transforming data into intelligence.
texts.text: A new type of infrastructure has emerged-AI factories. Just as earlier factories forged steel or assembled cars, AI factories generate tokens, transforming data into intelligence.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: At NVIDIA, we are building this futuredesigning the engines of the AI age and creating the factories that will power the next wave of human progress.
texts.text: At NVIDIA, we are building this futuredesigning the engines of the AI age and creating the factories that will power the next wave of human progress.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: GTC 2025
texts.text: GTC 2025

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Our annual GTC conference-hailed as the 'Woodstock of AI'-is the launchpad of the AI industry. This year, nearly 27,000 attendees gathered in San Jose, with hundreds of thousands more joining online. They came from some 100 countries, more than 10,000 companies, and more than 400 of the world's most promising startups.
texts.text: Our annual GTC conference-hailed as the 'Woodstock of AI'-is the launchpad of the AI industry. This year, nearly 27,000 attendees gathered in San Jose, with hundreds of thousands more joining online. They came from some 100 countries, more than 10,000 companies, and more than 400 of the world's most promising startups.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Blackwell to Rubin to Feynman; and the rise of the next wavesagentic AI and physical AI-beyond perception and generative AI.
texts.text: Blackwell to Rubin to Feynman; and the rise of the next wavesagentic AI and physical AI-beyond perception and generative AI.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: We introduced new platforms and partnerships to bring AI to every enterprise and industry, and unveiled transformative technologies for robotics and autonomous machines.
texts.text: We introduced new platforms and partnerships to bring AI to every enterprise and industry, and unveiled transformative technologies for robotics and autonomous machines.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: GTC 2025 made it unmistakenly clear: NVIDIA has transformed from a chip company to a fullstack computing platform, to data center-scale AI systems, to the AI infrastructure company.
texts.text: GTC 2025 made it unmistakenly clear: NVIDIA has transformed from a chip company to a fullstack computing platform, to data center-scale AI systems, to the AI infrastructure company.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Today, companies and countries rely on NVIDIA to build the essential infrastructure of the AI age.
texts.text: Today, companies and countries rely on NVIDIA to build the essential infrastructure of the AI age.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: GTC 2025 showcased the accelerating frontier of AI: reasoning and inferencetime scaling that will drive a 100x increase computing demand; our computing roadmap from NVIDIA
texts.text: GTC 2025 showcased the accelerating frontier of AI: reasoning and inferencetime scaling that will drive a 100x increase computing demand; our computing roadmap from NVIDIA

texts.label: text
texts.orig: In the decade ahead, trillions of dollars of AI infrastructure will be built, reshaping the $100 trillion global economy.
texts.text: In the decade ahead, trillions of dollars of AI infrastructure will be built, reshaping the $100 trillion global economy.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Financials and Strategic Positioning
texts.text: Financials and Strategic Positioning

texts.label: text
texts.orig: This year marked a structural shift in the computing economy. Fiscal 2025 was not a transition, it was a break from the past. AI models moved beyond answering questions to reasoning through complex tasks. Inference workloads surpassed training. And AI infrastructure expanded beyond centralized data centers into factories, vehicles, hospitals, and homes around the world. This metamorphosis drove exceptional performance.
texts.text: This year marked a structural shift in the computing economy. Fiscal 2025 was not a transition, it was a break from the past. AI models moved beyond answering questions to reasoning through complex tasks. Inference workloads surpassed training. And AI infrastructure expanded beyond centralized data centers into factories, vehicles, hospitals, and homes around the world. This metamorphosis drove exceptional performance.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: › Revenue more than doubled to $130.5 billion, up 114% year-over-year
texts.text: › Revenue more than doubled to $130.5 billion, up 114% year-over-year

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: › Operating income rose 147% to $81.5 billion
texts.text: › Operating income rose 147% to $81.5 billion

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: › Earnings per share grew 147% to $2.94
texts.text: › Earnings per share grew 147% to $2.94

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The fourth quarter capped a defining year:
texts.text: The fourth quarter capped a defining year:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: › $39.3 billion in revenue, up 78% year-over-year and 12% sequentially
texts.text: › $39.3 billion in revenue, up 78% year-over-year and 12% sequentially

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: › $22.1 billion in net income
texts.text: › $22.1 billion in net income

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: › $16.6 billion in operating cash flow
texts.text: › $16.6 billion in operating cash flow

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: From Training to Reasoning
texts.text: From Training to Reasoning

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Data center revenue reached $115.2 billion, up 142% year-over-year.
texts.text: Data center revenue reached $115.2 billion, up 142% year-over-year.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Q4 alone delivered $35.6 billion, including $11 billion in Blackwell revenue, the fastest product ramp in our company's history.
texts.text: Q4 alone delivered $35.6 billion, including $11 billion in Blackwell revenue, the fastest product ramp in our company's history.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: What began with training is now shifting toward real-time reasoning. Inference has become the dominant workload, and agentic systems are entering production across sovereign AI initiatives, Fortune 500 enterprises, and edge deployments.
texts.text: What began with training is now shifting toward real-time reasoning. Inference has become the dominant workload, and agentic systems are entering production across sovereign AI initiatives, Fortune 500 enterprises, and edge deployments.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Full Stack, End-to-End AI Infrastructure
texts.text: Full Stack, End-to-End AI Infrastructure

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The Blackwell platform integrates GPU, CPU, NVLink, Spectrum-X, and NVIDIA software into a unified system, optimized for every stage of AI, from pre-training and post-training to real-time reasoning and inference.
texts.text: The Blackwell platform integrates GPU, CPU, NVLink, Spectrum-X, and NVIDIA software into a unified system, optimized for every stage of AI, from pre-training and post-training to real-time reasoning and inference.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: As AI factories become multi-billiondollar investments, the need for assured performance, reliability, and long-term support is critical. AI continues to advance and change at an incredible pace. With NVIDIA's leadership across every phase of AI, rich ecosystem, programmability, and generations of experience, customers can have complete confidence to scale to the largest infrastructures with us.
texts.text: As AI factories become multi-billiondollar investments, the need for assured performance, reliability, and long-term support is critical. AI continues to advance and change at an incredible pace. With NVIDIA's leadership across every phase of AI, rich ecosystem, programmability, and generations of experience, customers can have complete confidence to scale to the largest infrastructures with us.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: We made tremendous progress this year. NVIDIA is now a full-stack AI company-spanning chips, systems, software, and AI models delivered through NVIDIA Inference Microservices (NIMs), a fully operational AI model packaged in a container. To accelerate deployment, we introduced NIMs, AI Blueprints, and the Nemotron model family, enabling enterprises across finance to healthcare to adopt AI faster.
texts.text: We made tremendous progress this year. NVIDIA is now a full-stack AI company-spanning chips, systems, software, and AI models delivered through NVIDIA Inference Microservices (NIMs), a fully operational AI model packaged in a container. To accelerate deployment, we introduced NIMs, AI Blueprints, and the Nemotron model family, enabling enterprises across finance to healthcare to adopt AI faster.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: NVIDIA is an end-to-end AI infrastructure platform, from GPUs (Blackwell) and CPUs (Grace) to network processors (CX and Bluefield), scaleup NVLink switches, and scale-out networking with Quantum (InfiniBand) and Spectrum (Ethernet). Each is worldclass, highly differentiated, and deeply integrated with NVIDIA software.
texts.text: NVIDIA is an end-to-end AI infrastructure platform, from GPUs (Blackwell) and CPUs (Grace) to network processors (CX and Bluefield), scaleup NVLink switches, and scale-out networking with Quantum (InfiniBand) and Spectrum (Ethernet). Each is worldclass, highly differentiated, and deeply integrated with NVIDIA software.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: We've fundamentally redefined what we build. Instead of assembling AI systems from separately designed components, we now architect and design full-stack, end-to-end AI factories. Blackwell, Rubin, and Feynman aren't just chips, they're AI factories: purpose-built to scale, deeply optimized, and supported across their operational lifetimes.
texts.text: We've fundamentally redefined what we build. Instead of assembling AI systems from separately designed components, we now architect and design full-stack, end-to-end AI factories. Blackwell, Rubin, and Feynman aren't just chips, they're AI factories: purpose-built to scale, deeply optimized, and supported across their operational lifetimes.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Though we architect AI factories as a unit, we open the architectures to integrate seamlessly into the diverse environments of our customers, delivered by a global network of system makers across the supply chain. This enables a scale and velocity in deploying these oneand-a-half-ton AI supercomputers the world has never seen before.
texts.text: Though we architect AI factories as a unit, we open the architectures to integrate seamlessly into the diverse environments of our customers, delivered by a global network of system makers across the supply chain. This enables a scale and velocity in deploying these oneand-a-half-ton AI supercomputers the world has never seen before.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Operational Scale, Disciplined Investment
texts.text: Operational Scale, Disciplined Investment

texts.label: text
texts.orig: We're investing at pace-with discipline, efficiency, and purpose. Operating expenses rose 45% year-over-year to $16.4 billion, reflecting sustained investment in engineering, compute infrastructure, our global supply chain, developers, and go-to-market partners.
texts.text: We're investing at pace-with discipline, efficiency, and purpose. Operating expenses rose 45% year-over-year to $16.4 billion, reflecting sustained investment in engineering, compute infrastructure, our global supply chain, developers, and go-to-market partners.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: AI demands massive infrastructure scale-more than silicon. It requires a full-stack ecosystem: software, systems, and a global supply chain capable of delivering end-to-end AI factories at incredible speed and scale. We ended the fiscal year with:
texts.text: AI demands massive infrastructure scale-more than silicon. It requires a full-stack ecosystem: software, systems, and a global supply chain capable of delivering end-to-end AI factories at incredible speed and scale. We ended the fiscal year with:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: › $43.2 billion in cash, cash equivalents, and marketable securities
texts.text: › $43.2 billion in cash, cash equivalents, and marketable securities

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: › $64.1 billion in operating cash flow
texts.text: › $64.1 billion in operating cash flow

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: › $34.5 billion of cash returned to shareholders, including $33.7 billion in buybacks and $834 million in dividends
texts.text: › $34.5 billion of cash returned to shareholders, including $33.7 billion in buybacks and $834 million in dividends

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Engineering for Continuity
texts.text: Engineering for Continuity

texts.label: text
texts.orig: We're operating in a dynamic environment-marked by shifting policies, evolving demand, and rapid technological adoption. Our model is designed for resilience:
texts.text: We're operating in a dynamic environment-marked by shifting policies, evolving demand, and rapid technological adoption. Our model is designed for resilience:

texts.orig: › Geographically diversified manufacturing across foundries, substrates, and systems makers
texts.text: › Geographically diversified manufacturing across foundries, substrates, and systems makers

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: › $30.8 billion in supply commitments to support customer continuity
texts.text: › $30.8 billion in supply commitments to support customer continuity

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: › Deep partnerships with Amazon, Cisco, Microsoft, Oracle, Google, CoreWeave, and others to scale across markets
texts.text: › Deep partnerships with Amazon, Cisco, Microsoft, Oracle, Google, CoreWeave, and others to scale across markets

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: › Sovereign AI clusters in Japan, France, India, and Canada
texts.text: › Sovereign AI clusters in Japan, France, India, and Canada

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: › Enterprise AI partners including Dell, HPE, Accenture, Deloitte, ServiceNow, SAP, and more
texts.text: › Enterprise AI partners including Dell, HPE, Accenture, Deloitte, ServiceNow, SAP, and more

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: › Industrial AI partners including Cadence, Synopsys, Siemens, Foxconn, and more
texts.text: › Industrial AI partners including Cadence, Synopsys, Siemens, Foxconn, and more

texts.label: text
texts.orig: In the coming years, every company will operate AI factories they built or rent, and every country will build and operate AI factories as part of their critical infrastructure. NVIDIA is their partner to build these foundational deployments, at scale.
texts.text: In the coming years, every company will operate AI factories they built or rent, and every country will build and operate AI factories as part of their critical infrastructure. NVIDIA is their partner to build these foundational deployments, at scale.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: This year, for the first time, NVIDIA began manufacturing AI chips and supercomputers in the United States. In partnership with TSMC, Foxconn, Wistron, Amkor, and SPIL, we secured over a million square feet of advanced manufacturing space across Arizona and Texas. These facilities will produce Blackwell chips and assemble full AI systems-bringing AI infrastructure closer to the industries and institutions that depend on it.
texts.text: This year, for the first time, NVIDIA began manufacturing AI chips and supercomputers in the United States. In partnership with TSMC, Foxconn, Wistron, Amkor, and SPIL, we secured over a million square feet of advanced manufacturing space across Arizona and Texas. These facilities will produce Blackwell chips and assemble full AI systems-bringing AI infrastructure closer to the industries and institutions that depend on it.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Within the next four years, we expect up to half a trillion dollars of AI infrastructure to be built on U.S. soilstrengthening supply chains, creating new jobs, and accelerating our nation's leadership in advanced compute.
texts.text: Within the next four years, we expect up to half a trillion dollars of AI infrastructure to be built on U.S. soilstrengthening supply chains, creating new jobs, and accelerating our nation's leadership in advanced compute.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: From Perception to Physical Intelligence
texts.text: From Perception to Physical Intelligence

texts.label: text
texts.orig: A decade ago, AI was in its infancy. In 2012, AlexNet ignited the deep learning revolution, demonstrating that GPUs could train neural networks with superhuman accuracy. What began with pattern recognition quickly evolved into machines that could see, hear, and understand.
texts.text: A decade ago, AI was in its infancy. In 2012, AlexNet ignited the deep learning revolution, demonstrating that GPUs could train neural networks with superhuman accuracy. What began with pattern recognition quickly evolved into machines that could see, hear, and understand.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Perception AI enabled computers to understand the world-powering breakthroughs in speech recognition, medical imaging, and personalized recommendations.
texts.text: Perception AI enabled computers to understand the world-powering breakthroughs in speech recognition, medical imaging, and personalized recommendations.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Then came generative AI: AI that creates new content. From text and images to code and proteins, generative AI is a new computing model, shifting from processing data and retrieving information to generating original content.
texts.text: Then came generative AI: AI that creates new content. From text and images to code and proteins, generative AI is a new computing model, shifting from processing data and retrieving information to generating original content.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Now we're entering the era of agentic AI; AI that can analyze, reason, plan, and use tools to solve problems. These intelligent systems act as digital teammates, automating workflows, accelerating development, and assisting in everything from customer service to healthcare.
texts.text: Now we're entering the era of agentic AI; AI that can analyze, reason, plan, and use tools to solve problems. These intelligent systems act as digital teammates, automating workflows, accelerating development, and assisting in everything from customer service to healthcare.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Our Nemotron models, purpose-built for reasoning and deployed as NIMs, along with our tools for building custom agents, make it easy for any company to create, train, and deploy agentic AI.
texts.text: Our Nemotron models, purpose-built for reasoning and deployed as NIMs, along with our tools for building custom agents, make it easy for any company to create, train, and deploy agentic AI.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Next is physical AI-intelligent systems that operate in the real world. From autonomous machines in warehouses to robotic assistants in hospitals and self-driving cars, physical AI is built to work safely alongside us.
texts.text: Next is physical AI-intelligent systems that operate in the real world. From autonomous machines in warehouses to robotic assistants in hospitals and self-driving cars, physical AI is built to work safely alongside us.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: From One to Three AI Scaling Laws
texts.text: From One to Three AI Scaling Laws

texts.label: text
texts.orig: AI is now governed by three scaling laws-each demonstrating more compute leads to smarter AI:
texts.text: AI is now governed by three scaling laws-each demonstrating more compute leads to smarter AI:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 1. Pre-Training Scaling: The original law: more data, larger models, and more compute produce more capable systems. This remains foundational.
texts.text: 1. Pre-Training Scaling: The original law: more data, larger models, and more compute produce more capable systems. This remains foundational.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 2. Post-Training Scaling: Models continue to improve after initial training. Fine-tuning, reinforcement learning, human feedback, and synthetic data generation drive exponential refinement. At scale, post-training can be even more compute-intensive than pre-training.
texts.text: 2. Post-Training Scaling: Models continue to improve after initial training. Fine-tuning, reinforcement learning, human feedback, and synthetic data generation drive exponential refinement. At scale, post-training can be even more compute-intensive than pre-training.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 3. Inference (Test-Time) Scaling:
texts.text: 3. Inference (Test-Time) Scaling:

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Inference is no longer a one-shot process, it's real-time reasoning. Models dynamically allocate compute to think through complex tasks, explore alternatives, and plan actions. Agentic AI depends on this capability. Reasoning or 'thinking' can require 100x more compute than one-shot inference.
texts.text: Inference is no longer a one-shot process, it's real-time reasoning. Models dynamically allocate compute to think through complex tasks, explore alternatives, and plan actions. Agentic AI depends on this capability. Reasoning or 'thinking' can require 100x more compute than one-shot inference.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: With hundreds of millions of users engaging AI, and agentic AI systems operating continuously in the background, inference has become the most compute-intensive phase of AI.
texts.text: With hundreds of millions of users engaging AI, and agentic AI systems operating continuously in the background, inference has become the most compute-intensive phase of AI.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Every interaction with a computer will trigger AI inference. And as agentic AI begins preempting tasks and responding to complex requests, inference workloads will scale dramatically-driving massive deployments of AI factories.
texts.text: Every interaction with a computer will trigger AI inference. And as agentic AI begins preempting tasks and responding to complex requests, inference workloads will scale dramatically-driving massive deployments of AI factories.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Enter Blackwell
texts.text: Enter Blackwell

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Blackwell isn't just faster. It's the first architecture purpose-built for every stage of AI, from training to reasoning at scale. With FP4 precision, longcontext processing, and dynamic compute allocation, it makes testtime scaling real time as well as energy and cost efficient. Now in full production, Blackwell is NVIDIA's fastest product ramp ever-powering AI infrastructure across hyperscalers, enterprises, and sovereign clouds.
texts.text: Blackwell isn't just faster. It's the first architecture purpose-built for every stage of AI, from training to reasoning at scale. With FP4 precision, longcontext processing, and dynamic compute allocation, it makes testtime scaling real time as well as energy and cost efficient. Now in full production, Blackwell is NVIDIA's fastest product ramp ever-powering AI infrastructure across hyperscalers, enterprises, and sovereign clouds.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: At its core is the NVIDIA GB200 NVL72: 72 GPUs, 36 Grace CPUs, unified by NVLink, Spectrum-X Ethernet, and liquid or air cooling. It delivers up to 30x faster inference for trillionparameter models like GPT-4 or Grok3-at the lowest total cost per watt, per rack, and per dollar invested.
texts.text: At its core is the NVIDIA GB200 NVL72: 72 GPUs, 36 Grace CPUs, unified by NVLink, Spectrum-X Ethernet, and liquid or air cooling. It delivers up to 30x faster inference for trillionparameter models like GPT-4 or Grok3-at the lowest total cost per watt, per rack, and per dollar invested.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: A Full-Stack Platform for Scaling Intelligence
texts.text: A Full-Stack Platform for Scaling Intelligence

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Blackwell is more than silicon. Its supporting technologies are foundational to the next wave of AI factories:
texts.text: Blackwell is more than silicon. Its supporting technologies are foundational to the next wave of AI factories:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: › NVLink 5 and NVSwitch connect 72 Blackwell GPUs into a massive compute resource enabling exascale performance for AI factories.
texts.text: › NVLink 5 and NVSwitch connect 72 Blackwell GPUs into a massive compute resource enabling exascale performance for AI factories.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: › Spectrum-X extends networking capabilities to support scaleout AI factories with hundreds of thousands of GPUs.
texts.text: › Spectrum-X extends networking capabilities to support scaleout AI factories with hundreds of thousands of GPUs.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: › Silicon photonics unlocks efficient multi-rack GPU scaling-laying the foundation for ultra-large-scale AI factories with millions of GPUs.
texts.text: › Silicon photonics unlocks efficient multi-rack GPU scaling-laying the foundation for ultra-large-scale AI factories with millions of GPUs.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: These advances make Blackwell the compute engine behind AI's next industrial phase.
texts.text: These advances make Blackwell the compute engine behind AI's next industrial phase.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: The Operating System of AI Factories
texts.text: The Operating System of AI Factories

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Announced at GTC, NVIDIA Dynamo is the inference operating system of the AI factory. Dynamo smartly schedules incoming queries and orchestrates compute resources to minimize response time while maximizing factory throughput. In DeepSeek-R1, Dynamo boosted inference throughput by 30x, cutting the cost of longcontext reasoning dramatically.
texts.text: Announced at GTC, NVIDIA Dynamo is the inference operating system of the AI factory. Dynamo smartly schedules incoming queries and orchestrates compute resources to minimize response time while maximizing factory throughput. In DeepSeek-R1, Dynamo boosted inference throughput by 30x, cutting the cost of longcontext reasoning dramatically.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The world's top cloud providersAmazon, Microsoft, Google, and Oracle-have increased their investment in Blackwell, with early orders already exceeding Hopper's peak volumes.
texts.text: The world's top cloud providersAmazon, Microsoft, Google, and Oracle-have increased their investment in Blackwell, with early orders already exceeding Hopper's peak volumes.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: What's Next: Blackwell Ultra and Rubin
texts.text: What's Next: Blackwell Ultra and Rubin

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Later this year, Blackwell Ultra arrivesboosting memory bandwidth, energy efficiency, and long-context support for agentic and multimodal models. It's purpose-built for real-time planning, decision-making, and AI-native applications. Compared to Hopper, it delivers up to 50x more AI factory value.
texts.text: Later this year, Blackwell Ultra arrivesboosting memory bandwidth, energy efficiency, and long-context support for agentic and multimodal models. It's purpose-built for real-time planning, decision-making, and AI-native applications. Compared to Hopper, it delivers up to 50x more AI factory value.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Rubin, our next-generation platform, is built for a world defined by trillionparameter agentic AI models. Blackwell today. Blackwell Ultra tomorrow. Rubin on the horizon. And Feynman beyond. Each generation pushes technology to the limits of physics, increasing AI factory throughput while reducing cost per token generated. And every generation is architecturally compatible, preserving
texts.text: Rubin, our next-generation platform, is built for a world defined by trillionparameter agentic AI models. Blackwell today. Blackwell Ultra tomorrow. Rubin on the horizon. And Feynman beyond. Each generation pushes technology to the limits of physics, increasing AI factory throughput while reducing cost per token generated. And every generation is architecturally compatible, preserving

texts.label: text
texts.orig: the massive software investments made by the global ecosystem of AI researchers and software developers building on the NVIDIA platform.
texts.text: the massive software investments made by the global ecosystem of AI researchers and software developers building on the NVIDIA platform.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: NVIDIA is the engine powering the world's AI infrastructure.
texts.text: NVIDIA is the engine powering the world's AI infrastructure.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: By providing a multi-year view, we enable the world's vast supply chain-upstream and downstream-to prepare, align, and innovate alongside NVIDIA as we push technology to the limits of physics.
texts.text: By providing a multi-year view, we enable the world's vast supply chain-upstream and downstream-to prepare, align, and innovate alongside NVIDIA as we push technology to the limits of physics.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: CUDA-X Accelerates Industries
texts.text: CUDA-X Accelerates Industries

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The AI revolution is powered as much by software as by hardware. CUDA-X, our suite of over 400 acceleration libraries, bridges NVIDIA GPUs with real-world applications, delivering exponential performance gains across AI, supercomputing, and data analytics. Optimized for highly efficient parallel processing, these libraries unlock up to 200x acceleration, enabling massivescale training, real-time inference, and high-throughput data processing.
texts.text: The AI revolution is powered as much by software as by hardware. CUDA-X, our suite of over 400 acceleration libraries, bridges NVIDIA GPUs with real-world applications, delivering exponential performance gains across AI, supercomputing, and data analytics. Optimized for highly efficient parallel processing, these libraries unlock up to 200x acceleration, enabling massivescale training, real-time inference, and high-throughput data processing.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Across sectors-from healthcare to finance to robotics-CUDA-X is the software foundation of modern AI computing. With over 6 million developers and 40,000 companies
